trans-unit.source: Specifies when the system recycles the service object in the operation invocation process.
trans-unit.target: 指定当系统回收操作调用进程中的服务对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the ReleaseInstanceMode with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A> property to inform [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that the current service object must be recycled at a particular point in the invocation process.
trans-unit.target: 使用与 ReleaseInstanceMode<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A>属性以通知[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，必须在调用过程中的特定点回收当前服务对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is to recycle a service object according to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为是回收服务对象根据<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Recycles the object subsequent to the completion of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 回收操作完成后的对象。

trans-unit.source: Recycles the object prior to calling the operation and subsequent to the completion of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 回收对象在调用该操作之前和之后的操作完成。

trans-unit.source: Recycles the object prior to calling the operation.
trans-unit.target: 回收之前调用该操作的对象。

trans-unit.source: Recycles the object according to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode*> value.
